bug.author: DimitriF
bug.summary: keyboard shortcut not working on ubuntu 16.04
bug.description: Hello, The keyboard shortcut don't seems to do anything under ubuntu 16.04 I used the version v1.8.7. Dimitri

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/DimitriF>@DimitriF</denchmark-link> - which keyboard shortcut are you referring to? Or all of them?

Hello, the number keys are the one I would really use, in addition, I just tested the other presented in the README:
Working: ctrl+O, ctrl+I, ctrl+S, ctrl+E,ctrl+space, ctrl+D ; D, ctrl+C, ctrl+X, ctrl+V, dir(next/previous image)
Not working:
ctrl+T (Console said: Cannot read property 'stopTracking' of undefined), ctrl+N, no effect shift+Del, no effect but may be just for video ctrl+H, no effect number keys, no effect ctrl+dir (region manipulation); ctrl+alt+dir; wctrl+shift+dir
Unsure, not applicable: ctrl+A, space
I may have forgotten one or two.

Hello, I gave it another try but this time, I downloaded the linux AppImage (V 1.7.2) and it worked as intended. Previously, I took a zip file which looked like V 1.5.0 (VoTT-linux-x64.zip; with inside a version file saying 1.8.7).
